" This is a Joystick Enabled Controller for a Robot which can be used over Bluetooth and WiFi.
It Features 3 Controller modes :
Analog Joystick :- Your Bot can be controlled with an Anolog JoyStickon the Screen like a Video Game Controller.
Buttons :- Directional Buttons such as Forward, Backward, Left, Right and an Emergency Stop Make basic navigation very easy.
Motion Sensor :- Your phone takes realtime readings from the Motion Sensors (Gyroscope, Accelerometer and Magnetometer) to map the Current Orintation of the phone in 3D Space, processes it and sends that data via the connection which your Bot can then use for navigation.
It also features a simple Login mechanism which can keep all the settings intact for each user so that you dont have to configure everything from the ground up next time you use this app.
Just make sure to Add a new user from the menu the first time you install and run this app.
Keep experimenting, learning and have fun.
Report bugs at - nishthapa@gmail.com
DEVELOPED BY - NISHANT THAPA
CHANGELOG :
Version 2.1 BETA - * Typo fixes. * Minor Bug Fixes. * Major improvements in Digital Buttons mode. * Major improvements in Database performance. * Major improvements in MultiTouch.
Version 2.0 BETA - * Migrated project to Android Studio. * Added Material Design User Interface. * Temporarily removed Joystick due to inconsistencies.
Version 1.1.3 BETA - * Massively improved readings from the Motion Sensors (particularly the Magnetometer and Gyroscope) so there is negligible noise introduced from the Earth's Geomagnetic Field. Also minimized Overtime Gyroscopic drift.
Version 1.1.2 BETA - * Bluetooth will automatically be disabled when Logging out or exiting the app * Added Disconnect button. (Which also Disables Bluetooth to save Power).
Version 1.1.0 BETA - * Application first created.
"
